display_long_description: "Lethal Apes" is a spine-chilling horror experience set in the eerie confines of a clandestine facility. Inspired by the adrenaline-pumping dynamics of the classic game "Gorilla Tag," this fan-made rendition plunges players into a heart-pounding world where terror lurks around every corner. As they navigate through the dimly-lit corridors of the facility, players take on the role of primal beings, mutated and driven by an insatiable thirst for blood. Encountering grotesque horrors and facing relentless pursuit, they must utilize their agility and cunning to outmaneuver the lurking threats and escape the clutches of doom. With each step shrouded in uncertainty and every shadow concealing a potential threat, "Lethal Apes" delivers an immersive horror experience that will leave players trembling with fear long after they've escaped the nightmare.
